Class LeftSidebar

Left sidebar API.

Index

Methods

hide

  • hide(): void

  • Hide left side bar.

    example
    viewer.leftSidebar.hide();

    Returns void

show

  • show(): void

  • Show the left side bar.

    example

    Returns void
